# Disco

Welcome to the introduction and extended documentation for the discoveryengine! The discoveryengine, also known as "Disco Engine" or just "Disco," is a tool enabling Prospect Development staff to do custom prospecting, written in the R programming language. Feel free to read this document in order, or to jump around or just bookmark it and refer to it as needed. You may find the search feature helpful -- just click on the little magnifying glass at the top of the screen.
